comments:
Hello guys,

I try to run Birt, I open the Birt view. I want to make a new report (a very
simple one, just for testing), but when I click Finish, I've got a
NullPointerException.

Is it because my version of Mozilla is 1.0 ? 

Thanks.

Here is my eclipse log :

Could you please provide the more environmenet informationi like OS/GEF/Eclipse 
version, etc?
We reproduce this problem.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Could you please provide the more environmenet informationi like OS/GEF/Eclipse 
> version, etc?
> We reproduce this problem.

OS version : Debian GNU/Linux woody
XFree86 : 4.2.1
Window Manager : BlackBox
Eclipse version : 3.0.1 OpenMotif
GEF version : 3.0.1
EMF version : 2.0.3

I hope this can help.

Maybe your Debain woody os has no Motif GUI packages installed, debian os
usually has installed GTK+ packages to provide GUI feature, so, change your
eclipse version to Eclipse 3.0.1 for GTK(+), you will get the BIRT run correctly.
Hope this help!
